stories.text:
Hi HN, My name is Ravi Sojitra and i'm working on a Dev Tool product named DhiWise, that let you generate production ready source code(For Node.js,Laravel,Flutter,Kotlin,Swift) in few mins with ready to get synced in your GitHub/GitLab or Download.

Let me explain like you're five.

Imagine you want to bake a cake and you have all the raw materials you need such as flour, baking powder, eggs.

Now, you give us those materials and we will bake you the ready-to-serve cake of your choice.

With this product's context, with just minimal technology specific inputs, this builder is going to generate source code to boost developersâ€™ productivity time by twofold. Check few of many features we have to offer,

Node.js Builder:

- User Auth (with passport) / Social Logins

- All CRUD Apis with many combinations

- Role Permissions with different platforms

- Hooks, Middlewares, Policies

- Deploy Code on sandbox

- Download source code in MVC or Clean Code architecture.

Figma to Flutter/Kotlin/Swift: - Auto identified Components (AppBar,TabBar,Drawer,Maps,Calendar,Form Inputs,Stacks,Grids etc)

- Auto/Manual Page navigation

- API Integrations

- Firebase Support

- All Screen Resolutions Support in Generated code

- Download source Code in MVVM architecture

We have lots of things in our upcoming roadmap.

If you're interested, feel free to sign up at https://www.dhiwise.com/ and play around with tool.
stories.title: Show HN: Platform that lets you generate source code of end to end apps
